comment: Everytime I open Saved files it keeps on saying "Couldn't Refresh feed? Please fix it. This is being going on for 2 days. Please Fix it. I have tried everything possible, but it's still not working. Please fix this problem. And also my videos and pictures are not getting saved in certain albums Please fix it
scenarios: Opening Saved files results in the error message "Couldn't Refresh feed" repeatedly.
Videos and pictures are not getting saved in certain albums.
key sentence: Opening Saved files results in the error message "Couldn't Refresh feed" repeatedly.
the function of activity: This activity involves managing user profiles and interactions, creating and editing content, exploring media, and adjusting privacy and notification settings on a social media platform.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'View Profile', 'description': "View the user's profile page including their posts, followers, and following details."}, {'name': 'Edit Profile', 'description': 'Open the edit profile screen to update profile information, including bio, name, and other details.'}, {'name': 'Share Profile', 'description': "Share the user's profile with others through available sharing options."}, {'name': 'Follow User', 'description': "Follow or unfollow the user displayed on the profile by interacting with the 'Follow' button."}, {'name': 'View Posts', 'description': "View the user's posts, organized in grid view or other display formats like reels or highlights."}, {'name': 'View Story Highlights', 'description': "View the user's story highlights by interacting with 'Explore Content', 'description': 'Explore recommended or trending content based on user interests and activities.'}, {'name': 'Send Message', 'description': 'Send a direct message to the user by clicking on the message icon or button in their profile.'}, {'name': 'View Reel', 'description': 'View a short video (reel) posted by the user by interacting with the reel thumbnail or button.'}, {'name': 'View Followers', 'description': "Click on the 'Followers' button to see the list of people following the user."}, {'name': 'View Following', 'description': "Click on the 'Following' button to see the list of people the user is following."}, {'name': 'View Profile Picture', 'description': "Click on the user's profile picture to view it in full size or edit the avatar image."}, {'name': 'View Notifications', 'description': 'View notifications for activities like new followers, comments, or likes by interacting with the notification icon in the action bar.'}, {'name': 'View Settings',
